scoreEntries.title: README & Setup Documentation
scoreEntries.details: README includes CI/CD badges, environment deployment indicators, a clear overview of Logstash architecture (polling and listening nodes), Helm installation commands, and MetricBeat setup.

scoreEntries.title: Architecture Documentation
scoreEntries.details: Comprehensive architecture documentation available, covering deployment model (StatefulSet), replication, exposed ports, pipeline configuration, persistent queues, security, observability, and network flow.

scoreEntries.title: Runbooks & Operations
scoreEntries.details: Comprehensive runbooks available, including pod health checks, log inspection, pipeline validation, Elasticsearch connectivity tests, secrets debugging, resource limit checks, and port/service validation.
